tool_description: Get the age and registration date of a domain
name: Domain Age
title: Domain Age

api_list.name: Get the age and registration date of a domain
api_list.description: This endpoint will display the age of the entered domain and the registration date when the domain was created.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://domain-age.p.rapidapi.com/domain_age/lookkle.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "domain-age.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://domain-age.p.rapidapi.com/domain_age/{domain}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "domain-age.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
